definition: surname Shao/name of an ancient state that existed in what is now Shaanxi Province
to call together/to summon/to convene/temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Israel said yesterday that it is calling up thousands of reservists .
sentences.chinese: 以色列昨天聲稱已經召集了成千上萬個後備軍。

sentences.english: Where now we gather in linden's shadow at eventide.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏時刻，我們在菩提樹下召集。

sentences.english: The tutor is suspicious about the hermit's identity and leaves to summon reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 這個家庭教師懷疑神父的身份，便離開去召集救兵。

sentences.english: When the day arrived, the headman assembled all the villagers and led them into the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 到了約定時日，大臣召集全部村民，帶入叢林。

sentences.english: Mr Harrison called a meeting of the directors on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 哈里遜先生星期二召集了一次主任會議。

sentences.english: He summoned the gods to council.
As expected, Marvel Studios has assembled the Avengers.
sentences.chinese: 跟預期一樣，驚奇漫畫工作室召集了衆多《復仇者》。

sentences.english: The lion king called the twelve zodiac meeting to discuss what row seating.
sentences.chinese: 獅子大王召集十二生肖開會，商量排座次的事。

sentences.english: I decided that they took too long so I called all the people together and I repaired the altar of the Lord that was broken.
sentences.chinese: 我決定不再等了，開始召集人馬修復我們的祭臺。

sentences.english: The new legislature will assemble in January.
sentences.chinese: 立法院將於一月召集會議。

sentences.english: I have convened this consultation for several reasons.
sentences.chinese: 我召集這次協商會有這樣幾個原因。

sentences.english: Sarna was going to be in charge of mustering and instructing the creatures in their task.
sentences.chinese: 莎娜會負責召集並指示那些生物實施任務。

sentences.english: He called the disciples together and then sent them to preach to the people.
sentences.chinese: 他把門徒召集到一起，然後差派他們去傳道。

sentences.english: He called on all painters to take part in a tryout in his palace.
sentences.chinese: 他召集了全國知名的畫師到宮中來參加甄試。

sentences.english: One day, government officials in Gaborone summoned Mark and Delia to a meeting.
sentences.chinese: 一天，哈博羅內的政府官員召集馬克和迪麗婭開會。

definition: to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
to call a conference/to convene a meeting
to assemble/to concentrate/to mass/to build up/to marshal
